recipesJson.name: Live Mixing With BubbasBrewz: Trinity Muffin
recipesJson.author: BubbasBrewz
recipesJson.description:
Holy Trinity blueberry muffin made on live mixing with BubbasBrewz. 

After a 4-5 day steep the blueberry really shines through like it should leaving a nice creamy blueberry on the exhale, with a nice pastry taste up front on the inhale.

pageContext.name: Live Mixing With BubbasBrewz: Trinity Muffin
